text: Vicente Trueba Pérez (October 16, 1905 in Sierrapando, Cantabria - November 10, 1986) was a Spanish professional cyclist. He is famous for being the first winner of the King of the Mountains in the Tour de France.Sports around the World: History, Culture, and Practice, ed. John Nauright (Santa Barbara, CA: ABC-CLIO, 2012), p. 454 This is a competition for the best climber in the race.
